TEXT.TITLE: JACOBS ENGINEERING <JEC> TO REINCORPORATE
TEXT.BODY: Jacobs Engineering group Inc said its shareholders approved reincorporation of the company in Delaware and certain indemnification agreements with officers and directors of the company. Jacobs is incorporated in California. Reuter
